Name: Little Hanoi - Bun Bo Hue special

Content.summary: 'Little Hanoi - Bun Bo Hue special' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Hanoi, Bun Bo Hue, Hospitality Recreation written on 30 May 2007
Content.tags: Hanoi, Bun Bo Hue, Hospitality Recreation
Content.bodyText:
More photos of the special are here.

Andy at Little Hanoi very kindly offered to cook as an authentic Bun Bo Hue. All we had to do was bring a big enough group to eat it all.

Needless to say the result was superb, best we've ever had. Unfortunately we can't rate it as you can't just walk in off the street and order it.

If you can get a big enough group (10 or more together) I'm sure Andy will get it together for you. Needless to say, drop us an email so we can come along too!
